title._content: Image taken from page 188 of '[Letters from Palestine, descriptive of a Tour through Galilee and Judæa, with some account of the Dead Sea, and of the present state of Jerusalem. [Letter 21 signed Th. R. J., i.e. T. R. Joliffe.]]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Letters from Palestine, descriptive of a Tour through Galilee and Judæa, with some account of the Dead Sea, and of the present state of Jerusalem.
